featured.text: All passengers riding in cars are required to fasten their seatbelts in order to reduce the risk of _____ in case of an accident.

definition.zh_def: 安全帶，通常用於汽車中以保護乘客在碰撞時的安全。
definition.en_def: A strap or belt in a vehicle designed to secure the occupant and prevent injury during a collision.
definition.example: Make sure to fasten your seatbelt before starting the car.
